start.question: Which country or region did you complete your nursing education?

english_language.question: Was your nursing education taught in English?

english_test_taken.question: Have you already taken an English proficiency test?

ask_which_test.question: Which English test do you plan to take?

ask_english_test.question: Which English test are you planning to take?

test_score_input.question: Enter your expected scores for each section.

education_level.question: What is the highest nursing qualification you have completed?

license_status.question: Do you currently hold a valid RN license in your home country?

practice_experience.question: How many years of RN practice experience do you have?

recency_of_practice.question: Have you practiced nursing within the last 4 years?

country_preferences.question: Do you have any preferred countries or regions?

priority_preferences.question: What is most important to you in choosing a pathway?

results.question: Based on your responses, we will now recommend the most suitable country and pathway.
